title: Pixel 2 XL does not charge USING A Official google charger
content:
So the problem started 3 weeks ago; my phone wasn't charging with the USB C to C Official charger, but using my oneplus charger, charged the Pixel.

I contacted Google Support, and they shipped me a new Google Charger, and this did charge my phone. Until yesterday, the phone was charging, it suddenly switched off and the charger stopped working.

Now; whats the fix for this issue? It's getting really annoying, as the other 3rd party chargers do not "fast" charge.
